text: Thirunageswaram is a panchayat town in Kumbakonam taluk, Thanjavur district, Tamil Nadu. It is a famous for its two temples, namely the Nagannatha Swami Temple and the Vaishnavite Oppiliappan Temple. ==Population== As of 2011 Census the population of the town is 15,082. ==References== Category:Thanjavur district
title: Thirunageswaram
